ygData.subject: Re: Lets find Bidl Frugin
ygData.msgSnippet: No, I unvis when I try to talk to them.  Meldrath and the guards dont attack me, I am Level 26, so they spawns in the room dont mess with me unless i try to
ygData.messageBody:
No, I unvis when I try to talk to them. Meldrath and the guards dont
attack me, I am Level 26, so they spawns in the room dont mess with me
unless i try to med while visible. The only time i get attacked by
Meldrath is when I try to kill a spawn in the room and he runs for
it. Meldrath then hits me with an infectous cloud and I can't go back into
that room without getting hit with it again until I zone and come back.

At 07:28 AM 07/23/1999 +0000, you wrote:
>From: "Joshua Bednarz" <thewhitemage@...>
>
>Actually, they won't respond anyway. You have to be visible to get NPC's
>to respond to you. This would mean you'd have to kill the guards and
>Meldrath....
